verses.roman:
mora mukhe ye saba rasa karilā pracāraṇe
sei rasa dekhi ei ihāra likhane

synonyms: mora mukhe—through my mouth; ye—whatever; saba rasa—all such transcendental mellows; karilā—You did; pracāraṇe—preaching; sei rasa—those same transcendental mellows; dekhi—I see; ei—this; ihāra likhane—in the writing of Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī.
translation: "I see that the truths regarding transcendental mellow that You have expounded through my mouth are all explained in the writings of Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī.
